function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to cleaner and efficient sources of fuel for cooking leading to health hazards","Impact":"Increased risk of stillbirth and severe health hazards","Mitigation":"Promoting cleaner cooking solutions and educating about the benefits of cleaner fuel","Technologies":"Clean cooking technologies and efficient household cooking solutions","People":"Low-income population in India and other developing countries","Owner":"Government, NGOs, and organizations promoting clean energy"},{"Description":"Poor indoor environmental quality due to modern lifestyle choices","Impact":"Increased cases of Sick Building Syndrome (SBS) by 30 to 200%","Mitigation":"Improving indoor air quality through better ventilation and reducing pollutants","Technologies":"Indoor heating and cooling systems, natural ventilation systems","People":"General population living in modern environments","Owner":"Architects, building developers, and environmental health organizations"},{"Description":"Factors affecting indoor environment including air exchange, humidity, temperature, ventilation, pollutants","Impact":"Adverse health consequences due to poor indoor environment","Mitigation":"Monitoring and controlling factors affecting indoor environment, promoting natural ventilation","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, natural ventilation systems","People":"General population living in modern environments","Owner":"Environmental health organizations, building managers, and architects"}]}
